Title: The Slave Pits
Description:
Sassy's over at the Slave Pits. She's there with the orcs getting ready to execute the final play on the Trade Prince.

$n, take the footbomb uniform up the road to the southwest and find her. I know she's going to want you to lead the charge!

Ack, I'm starting to talk like the coach now!
ObjectivesText: Speak with Sassy Hardwrench at the Slave Pits.
RewardText:
I was wondering where you were!

Don't worry, Hobart will get that footbomb uniform converted into the most Ultimate Footbomb Uniform ever!
